properties.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 22 at 1:59AM PST until January 22 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Large breaking waves 4 to 7 feet will develop on west and
northwest facing beaches today. Occasional sets to 9 feet are
possible bear Ventura. Dangerous rip currents are certain.

* WHERE...Ventura County Coast.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM PST this evening.

* IMPACTS...There is an increased risk for ocean drowning. Rip
currents can pull swimmers and surfers out to sea. Large
breaking waves can cause injury, wash people off beaches and
rocks, and capsize small boats near shore.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
properties.instruction:
Remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions, or stay
near occupied lifeguard towers. Rock jetties can be deadly in
such conditions, stay off the rocks.

NWSheadline: HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING
